# VEHICLE::SET_FORCE_LOW_LOD_ANCHOR_MODE

## Summary
Set this to true on boats which should remain in the non-physical, low LOD anchor mode even when a player is driving it

## Parameters
* **VEHICLE_INDEX** vehicleIndex
* **BOOL** forcePlayerLowLodAnchorFlag

## Description
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
No observed effect.
